trans-unit.source: An activity that demarcates a transaction boundary.
When this activity begins executing, a new <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> is started if one does not already exist.
The transaction commits when the activity and all other participants in the transaction have completed successfully.

The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> boundary.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the workflow should be aborted if the transaction aborts.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
`true` if the workflow should be aborted.
Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.

Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.TimeSpan"></xref> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The <xref href="System.TimeSpan"></xref> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
